original: 曹魏宦官，與權臣曹爽過從甚密，甚至將明帝的後宮妃嬪偷渡出宮給曹爽。高平陵之變後，與曹爽同被問斬，夷三族。
text: Cao Wei's eunuch has been close to Cao Shuang, the power official, and even smuggled the Ming Emperor's harem concubine out of the palace to Cao Shuang. After Gao Pingling's change, he and Cao Shuang were questioned and cut, the Yi tribe.
